text: Kenneth Robert Rosewall (born 2 November 1934) is an Australian former world top-ranking amateur and professional tennis player. He won a record 23 tennis Majors, including 8 Grand Slam singles titles and, before the Open Era and a record 15 Pro Slam titles. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Australian tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Sydney
title: Ken Rosewall
